data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Batelka, Jan, Straka, Jakub (2011): Ripiphorus caboverdianus sp. nov. — the first ripiphorid record from the Macaronesian volcanic islands (Coleoptera: Ripiphoridae: Ripiphorinae). Zootaxa 2792: 51-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276989
